segments.text: So , what's the status of our advertising campaign ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It'll be a national campaign starting next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What style will the ads be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suggest that we focus on slice of life , showing how you can beat the summer heat by biting into a cool ice-cream sandwich .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds like a good idea . Will we have a new slogan ?
segments.speaker: S1
